verses.verse: O <S%H7891>sing<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H7892>song<s%>: <S%H7891>sing<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, all the <S%H776>earth<s%>.
<S%H7891>Sing<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, <S%H1288>bless<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%>; show <S%H1319>forth<s%> his <S%H3444>salvation<s%> from <S%H3117>day<s%> to <S%H3117>day<s%>.
<S%H5608>Declare<s%> his <S%H3519>glory<s%> among the <S%H1471>heathen<s%>, his <S%H6381>wonders<s%> among all <S%H5971>people<s%>.
For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H1419>great<s%>, and <S%H3966>greatly<s%> to be <S%H1984>praised<s%>: he is to be <S%H3372>feared<s%> above all <S%H430>gods<s%>.
For all the <S%H430>gods<s%> of the <S%H5971>nations<s%> are <S%H457>idols<s%>: but the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>.
<S%H1935>Honor<s%> and <S%H1926>majesty<s%> are <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H5797>him<s%>: strength and <S%H8597>beauty<s%> are in his <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%>.
<S%H3051>Give<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, O you <S%H4940>kindreds<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H3051>give<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3519>glory<s%> and <S%H5797>strength<s%>.
<S%H3051>Give<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> the <S%H3519>glory<s%> due unto his <S%H8034>name<s%>: <S%H5375>bring<s%> an <S%H4503>offering<s%>, and <S%H935>come<s%> into his <S%H2691>courts<s%>.
O <S%H7812>worship<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> in the <S%H1927>beauty<s%> of <S%H6944>holiness<s%>: <S%H2342>fear<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H776>him<s%>, all the earth.

<S%H559>Say<s%> among the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H4427>reigns<s%>: the <S%H8398>world<s%> also shall be <S%H3559>established<s%> that it shall not be <S%H4131>moved<s%>: he shall <S%H1777>judge<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H4339>righteously<s%>.
Let the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> <S%H8055>rejoice<s%>, and let the <S%H776>earth<s%> be <S%H1523>glad<s%>; let the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H7481>roar<s%>, and the fullness <S%H4393>there<s%>.
Let the <S%H7704>field<s%> be <S%H5937>joyful<s%>, and all that is in <S%H6086>it<s%>: then shall all the trees of the <S%H3293>wood<s%> <S%H7442>rejoice<s%>

<S%H6440>Before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: for he <S%H935>comes<s%>, for he <S%H935>comes<s%> to <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%>: he shall <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H8398>world<s%> with <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>, and the <S%H5971>people<s%> with his <S%H530>truth<s%>.
